== Sarkara-Chirayinkeezhu (628472) ==

== Demography & Population ==

Sarkara-Chirayinkeezhu is a village in the [[Chirayinkeezhu]] taluka of [[Thiruvananthapuram]] district with an area of 1094 hectares and harbouring 7155 households with total population of 29907 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Attingal]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 13721 and female population is 16186. Scheduled Caste Population is 5072 and Scheduled Tribes population is 25. Census Location Code of the village is 628472<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 24532 (82.03%)
* Literate male population: 11554 (84.21%)
* Literate female population: 12978 (80.18%)
